<center> ## **Rachel E. Fanelli**
&nbsp;
<center>![Strouss Hill, Albany County, Wyoming. Photo Credit: Rachel E. Fanelli](images/strousshill_albany_co_WY.PNG){width=5000px}
&nbsp;

Growing up in a family that cherished time spent in the mountains and prairies of Wyoming, I was constantly surrounded by wildlife, thermal springs, and breathtaking skies. This close connection with nature sparked a deep fascination with ecology that has only grown over time, fueling my pursuit of a career as a research scientist. Explore my research page to discover the projects that I've contributed to and learn more about my ongoing PhD research.
